title: 282. Two Things We Need To Do Now To Save America
itunes:title: 282. Two Things We Need To Do Now To Save America
description: America needs a cultural revolution, and it starts with each of us taking personal accountability and getting involved on the ground level. In today's episode, Andy talks about his recent conversation with Donald Trump Jr., how the mainstream media has diluted the image of patriotism-loving Americans, and two actionable steps we can take to reinstate freedom.
